title: Eldritch Invocations
content:
Eldritch Invocations Effect In your study of occult lore, you have uearthed eldritch invocations, fragments of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability. Requirements Warlock Lv 2

Eldritch Invocations

In your study of occult lore, you have uearthed eldritch invocations, fragments of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability.
